name: 2D Platformer: The Tutorial!
description:
Hello! Here is the first tutorial version of my 2D platform for MSU's CAS117 class. 

For my next part, when I introduce my own modifications to the game, I plan to tell a story through the addition of more levels,  to re-skin the player character, and to re-skin the enemy characters. Also, I might try and add a power or other pickup item to the game.
